text: Eileen Anderson (October 18, 1928 - November 3, 2021) was an American politician. She was Mayor of Honolulu, Hawaii from 1981 to 1985. She was the first woman to hold the office. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mayors of Honolulu Category:Politicians from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Eileen Anderson
